Package geometries

Class BoundingBox

java.lang.Object
geometries.BoundingBox
public class BoundingBox
extends java.lang.Object
class represents axis-aligned bounding box, it is used to check if ray is in the area of a geometry by checking if the ray direction come with intersection in the bounding box of the geometry. It means for us that the calculation of all the intersections of the same ray should be taken into account
